Projects Events Papers Resume Contact

Hi! I am Rita Sevastjanova.

I am a data analyst with a visual analytics background, specializing in human-centered explainability for large language models. My work combines computational methods with interactive visual interfaces to bridge the gap between complex model internals and human understanding.

I earned my Ph.D. in Natural Sciences (Computer and Information Science) at the University of Konstanz in 2023.

Projects

    LayerFlow

    How to communicate uncertainty in dimensionality reduction when used for word embedding analysis?

    LMFingerprints

    Which linguistic properties are encoded in embedding vectors in different model's layers?

    Adapters

    Which language models encode semantic concepts such as stereotypes or word sentiment?

    Impact of Function Words

    Do models 'understand' the linguistic functionality of function words?

    Generated Text Comparison

    How to effectively compare texts generated by two language models?

    Token Self-Similarity

    What are the reasons for strong embedding contextualization?

lingvis.io

Visual Analytics. Linguistics. Machine Learning.
